text: Statistics is the practice of collecting and analyzing data in large quantities
Values such as counts, ratings, measurements, or opinions that are gathered to answer questions is called Data
Mean is a value that represents the evening out of the values in a set of data
The number that is the midpoint of a set of data is called Median
Mode is the data value that occurs the most
The difference between the least value and the greatest value in a data set is Range
A break or opening is called as Gap
The arrangement of values in a set is called Distribution
Data that is close together is called Cluster
One of the values that divides the distribution of the variable into four groups having equal frequencies is Quartiles
A value that lies far from the center of a distribution is called Outlier
Skewed is Asymmetry in a frequency distribution
Degree to which data are spread out around a center value is called Variability
Symmetrical can be Characterized by or exhibiting symmetry; well-proportioned, as a body or whole; regular in form or arrangement or corresponding parts
